title: Banners
description: Stores homepage banners and promotional content.

title.title: Title
title.description: Main headline text for the banner.

banner_image_url.title: Banner Image
banner_image_url.description: URL to the banner background image.

link_url.title: Link URL
link_url.description: Optional URL where the banner should link to.

display_order.title: Display Order
display_order.description: Order in which banners are displayed (lower numbers first).

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Boolean flag (1 for active, 0 for inactive).
